sentences.sContent: Rick accepted her offer of coffee.
sentences.sCn: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.sContent: He accepted the invitation to stay with us.
sentences.sCn: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.sContent: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.sCn: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。
请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.sContent: They offered me a job and I accepted.
sentences.sCn: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。

sentences.sContent: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.sCn: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。
